Hamachi on the internet ...First a friend Make Host An copy from Hamachi the IP (IP HOST)  

Make a Videogame shortcut, and add following command line;

1)Right Click On Game Click On Shorcut ( You Could  rename Client ), 

2)Right Click On Game-Shorcut Clic On Properties. In properties at Target, at the end add: 

 “IP Host”  -game -log

3)Double Click On Shorcut to Join Existing Host
